Body.Content:
Admins can now check SharePoint Agents trial usage reporting in the Copilot Admin Center! 

When this will happen:

This is available currently to all tenants that qualify and have opted in to the trial.

How this affects your organization:

From the Copilot Admin Center, Admins can now view month over month tenant wide usage, in addition to seeing the usage data via PowerShell. 

What you can do to prepare:

You may consider updating your training and documentation as appropriate.

See more details about viewing in PowerShell: Manage trial access to SharePoint agents with PowerShell.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Admins can now check SharePoint Agents trial usage data in the Copilot Admin Center. This feature is available to all qualifying tenants. Admins can view month-over-month usage and access data via PowerShell. Consider updating your training and documentation. More details are available in the provided link.

Title: SharePoint agents trial usage data now available in Microsoft Admin Center
